title: List of Scottish cricket and football players
text: This is a list of sportsmen who have played both <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class cricket</a> and professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a> or <a href="England">England</a>. The list includes four sportsmen who are dual internationals, having represented Scotland's national team at both sports.
